title: If no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content instead of returning an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Observe that the server returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content
5. Expected behavior: The server should return an HTTP error 404 instead.
